meanings.definition: The quality or state of lacking grace or elegance.
meanings.sent1: Her gracelessness was evident in the way she tripped over her own feet.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's gracelessness stood out among the group of skilled performers.
meanings.sent3: Despite her best efforts, her gracelessness on the dance floor always brought smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The room exuded an air of grace, making his gracelessness even more pronounced.
meanings.sent5: The gracelessness of his manners left a lasting impression on everyone he met.

meanings.definition: The act of being awkward or clumsy in movement or behavior.
meanings.sent1: His gracelessness on the soccer field made it hard for him to keep up with the other players.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's intentional gracelessness added a comedic touch to his performance.
meanings.sent3: In a moment of gracelessness, she spilled her drink all over the table.
meanings.sent4: The gracelessness of his actions spoke volumes about his lack of coordination.
meanings.sent5: The gracelessness of the puppet's movements made the audience burst into laughter.
